name: Baneposting

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bane posting
des:
Bane Posting! Role play as your favorite characters, CIA and Bane! Say your favorite lines from the plane scene, and Bane Posting will play out the scene 

To start, try saying

"Alexa, tell Bane Posting, you're a big guy
